alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:42PM EST until January 31 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River from Edwardsport to Hazleton. .Minor flooding will continue on the East Fork White at Seymour until Tuesday morning. Minor lowland flooding will continue at Edwardsport and develop over the next couple of days at Petersburg and Hazleton on the White River and last through the week. The crest on the White is near Elliston. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Significant agricultural lands begins to flood. High water affects some local roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM EST Monday was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Tuesday afternoon by around 1245 PM EST /1145 AM CST/.
